de.hebis.it.gndexpander

Class Loader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • de.hebis.it.gndexpander.Loader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Loader
extends java.lang.Thread
    Import program for GND authority record files provided by the DNB.
    The input files need to bee formated as marc21-XML.
    The processed records will be send to an solr index.
    Author:
    Reh, Uwe 2017-03-17

      • getData

        public static org.apache.solr.common.SolrInputDocument getData(java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<java.util.concurrent.Future<org.apache.solr.common.SolrInputDocument>> outputQueue,
                                                               java.lang.Thread inputThread)
        Helper to get results from a output queue.
        The response of method may be delayed for two reasons.
        • The next Future isn't ready yet.
        • The queue is empty, but the 'inputThread' is still alive and may produce new futures.
        Parameters:
        outputQueue - The outputQueue
        inputThread - the input thread
        Returns:
        A SolrDocument representing an authority record. Or NULL if no more data is left.
